const unsigned int kMinLevelIgnoreSize = 1024

include the texture base class.

File: GrTextureBase.cpp Author: Kevin Bray Created: 10-01-05 Copyright © 2005 Bootstrap Studios project includes. textures whose dimensions ( width *or* height ) >= is greater than this size honor the _mipLevelIgnore settings.
